thread.title: Ray Win
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Ray Win

author: Ray Win
title: Ray Win
text: The car was collected as promised and after a confirmation phone call. Went through MOT and service without a hitch. When I was phoned back, some suggested jobs e,g timing belt were mentioned. I'd had this done before, but hadn't recorded it in my service manual so I didn't need it.. Then I was given reference to pay online. When I got home car was waiting there. Perfect! will certainly deal with Servicing Stop again.
